dmca.title: No magic in Emagic
dmca.body:
I am writing to you because we have discovered you are still using the term "Logic Pro" and Emagic on your website (apple.com, emagic.de) without our authorixation and express permission and/or referring to Emagic GMBH.

Babya Software Group is the sole owner the above terms for our digital media devision's use only. We also learned that your software's Arrange window  mimics the Babya Logic UI in a similar way-thus violating our copyrights. 

Please respond via babyap2002@yahoo.co.uk within 10 days.

List:
apple.com/logic
emagic.de
apple.com/logicexpress
